short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep up with all the Kerning Cultures episodes!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension adds a cute little button to your Chrome browser, so that when you want to listen to a Kerning Cultures episode, they're all jut one-click away.

It will also notify you when new episodes are available.
